description: Provision a CIDR to a public IPv4 pool. For more information about IPAM, see What is IPAM? in the Amazon VPC IPAM User Guide.

parameters.name: IpamPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPAM pool you would like to use to allocate this CIDR.

parameters.name: PoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the public IPv4 pool you would like to use for this CIDR.

parameters.name: NetmaskLength
parameters.description: The netmask length of the CIDR you would like to allocate to the public IPv4 pool. The least specific netmask length you can define is 24.

nested_items.name: PoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the pool that you want to provision the CIDR to.

nested_items.name: PoolAddressRange
nested_items.description: Information about the address range of the public IPv4 pool.

nested_items.name: FirstAddress
nested_items.description: The first IP address in the range.

nested_items.name: LastAddress
nested_items.description: The last IP address in the range.

nested_items.name: AddressCount
nested_items.description: The number of addresses in the range.

nested_items.name: AvailableAddressCount
nested_items.description: The number of available addresses in the range.
